
{{alias}}( [month[, year]] )

Returns the number of hours in a month.

    If `month` is not provided, `month` defaults to the current month,
    according to local time.

    If `year` is not provided, `year` defaults to the current year,
    according to local time.

    Parameters
    ----------
    month: string|Date|integer (optional)
        Month.

    year: integer|Date (optional)
        Year.

    Returns
    -------
    out: integer
        Number of hours in a month.

    Examples
    --------
    > var num = {{alias}}()
    <number>
    > num = {{alias}}( 2 )
    <number>
    > num = {{alias}}( 2, 2016 )
    696
    > num = {{alias}}( 'feb', 2016 )
    696
    > num = {{alias}}( 'february', 2016 )
    696
    > num = {{alias}}( new Date() )
    <number>

    See Also
    --------
